 2019-06362019-06-02,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of LEANNE J. FITCH of Estey's Bridge, New Brunswick, to be a special adviser to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, to serve as Vice-Chairperson of the Interim Management Advisory Board for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, on a part-time basis, effective June 11, 2019.
AttachmentsAttachment
